children.text: Org wide customization, collaboration and control of your machine application development
We support you in choosing the right tool for the job

For you to have complete control over your engineering tool and environment.

Automation hub lets you customize and pre-configure your IDEs with centralized configuration possibilities

For OT developments:

* Automation Studio, as you know it!

* Automation Studio X, our new VS code based modern IDE.

Fully customizable; Let's you invent your own domain specific graphical programming language!

For IT developments:

* Any IDE

- VS Code
- Visual Studio
- Eclipse
- Jetbrains
DRY (Don't Repeat Yourselves), with reusable components and services
Automatically recognize resuable elements across projects in your organization
Encapsulate your know-how and complexity into proprietary components and services
Select from an evergrowing list of readily available automation components and services
Easily create reusable components and services with enriched metadata
Classify, categorize and reuse component and services  with version control
Quick start your development with quality and style
Create and centrally maintain your own frameworks, templates and code snippets
Select from a list of ever growing frameworks and templates
Made with 💗 by B&R application community
Manage all your integrations in one-place
Define and enforce policies across projects
Mandate usage of specific SW components
